original_text: Then I saw thrones, and seated on them were those to whom the authority to judge was committed. Also I saw the souls of those who had been beheaded for the testimony of Jesus and for the word of God, and those who had not worshiped the beast or its image and had not received its mark on their foreheads or their hands. They came to life and reigned with Christ for a thousand years.
korean_text: 또 내가 보좌들을 보니 거기에 앉은 자들이 있어 심판하는 권세를 받았더라 또 내가 보니 예수를 증언함과 하나님의 말씀 때문에 목 베임을 당한 자들의 영혼들과 또 짐승과 그의 우상에게 경배하지 아니하고 그들의 이마와 손에 그의 표를 받지 아니한 자들이 살아서 그리스도와 더불어 천 년 동안 왕 노릇 하니

sentences.original_text: and seated on them were those
to whom the authority to judge was committed
Also I saw the souls of those
who had been beheaded for the testimony of Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 예수의 증거 때문에 목 베임 당한 자들의 영혼들이 있었고

sentences.original_text: and for the word of God
and those who had not worshiped the beast
and had not received its mark on their foreheads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 이마에 그의 표를 받지 않았고

sentences.original_text: and reigned with Christ for a thousand years
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도와 함께 천 년 동안 다스리더라
